info.description: API to retrieve the customer details
info.title: Customer Details

get.summary: Retrieves the KYC details of a Customer
Retrieves the list of customers having the Kyc details

parameters.name: kycRelationship
parameters.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

get.summary: Retrieves the list of customers not having the Kyc details

parameters.name: kycRelationship
parameters.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

get.summary: Retrieves the details of a Customer

parameters.name: customerRelationGroupId
parameters.description: Identifies the key to Customer Relationship Group to form a relation

parameters.name: partyId
parameters.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

parameters.name: relationPartyId
parameters.description: Related customers or persons/entities that are part of the relationship.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of messages of a customer from Bank to Customer and from customer to Bank

parameters.name: fromCustomerId
parameters.description: The Customer ID from which the message is triggered.

parameters.name: toCustomerId
parameters.description: The unique customer identifier of the Payee, to whom the payment message is to be sent

get.summary: Retrieves the list of messages from Bank to Customer and from Customer to Bank

parameters.name: toCustomerId
parameters.description: The unique customer identifier of the Payee, to whom the payment message is to be sent

parameters.name: fromCustomerId
parameters.description: The Customer ID from which the message is triggered.

get.summary: API to retrieve the list of travel notification details for specific customer
Retrieves the list of preferred communication channels for the customer

contactDate.description: Date that first contact was made with the Customer.

amlLastResultDate.description: The last date when Anti Money Laundering result is performed and updated

introducer.description: Name of the person who introduced the Customer to the bank

kycRelationship.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

isKycComplete.description: Whether information related to the customer has been collected and verified

kycLastReviewDate.description: Date customer KYC information was last reviewed

kycNextSystemReviewDate.description: Date system has calculated customer should next be reviewed.

kycNextReviewDate.description: Next date of KYC review defined manually by the User

amlCheck.description: Describe the legal controls that is required by institutions to prevent or report Anti Money Laundering activities. It can have YES, SENT or NULL values.

amlResult.description: Describe the results of Anti Money Laundering.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

mnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch.

language.description: Language specific fields will be displayed under this entity

shortName.description: Contains the name of the account, basically the short title of the account.

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

kycRelationship.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

mnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch.

language.description: Language specific fields will be displayed under this entity

shortName.description: Contains the name of the account, basically the short title of the account.

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

mnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

numberOfDependents.description: Specifies the number of dependents to the customer

birthIncorpDate.description: Date on which the entity is incorporated

industryId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the industry in which the customer is trading, operating or is associated with

target.description: Specifies how the Customer is considered by the bank and how he fits in with the Account Officer's overall marketing strategy

residenceId.description: The identifier of the country of residence of a customer

buildingName.description: Represents the name of the building, entrance

buildingNumber.description: Represents the number that identifies the position of a building on a street

flatNumber.description: The number that identifies apartment and unit that have other dwellings above or below, often with shared access and common areas

language.description: Language specific fields will be displayed under this entity

street.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

postCode.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

countryName.description: This is the country name that the financial institution resides in.

townCountry.description: The town and country associated with the address

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof

legalIssueDate.description: Date of Issue of the legal document

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof

toDate.description: Indicates the business date until when the balance reservation event is active.

legalDocumentName.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport, driving licence etc., provided as identification proof

legalIssueAuthorisedDate.description: Authority who issued the legal document

legalHolderName.description: Name of the account holder in the Legal Document

fromDate.description: Indicates the business date from when the balance reservation event is active.

employerBusiness.description: The business of customer's employer involved.

salaryFrequency.description: Indicates the payment frequency of salary.

salaryCurrency.description: Currency in which the Salary information of the customer is maintained

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect
The phone number of the customer or prospect

addressLocation.description: Identifies the nature of the postal address, like primary, secondary or office address

smsNumber.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer

residentialStatus.description: Identifies the residence status of the customer.

fromDate.description: Indicates the business date from when the balance reservation event is active.

residentialStatus.description: Identifies the residence status of the customer.

customerRelationship.description: Create relationships between records held on the Customer application or the PERSON.ENTITY application

customerRelationGroupId.description: Identifies the key to Customer Relationship Group to form a relation

customerRelationGroupName.description: Name of a Customer Relationship Group if applicable to the relationship.

partyRelation.description: Originating Party's relationship to the underlying portfolio. Should be a valid relationship.

owningPercent.description: Used to record the percentage of ownership in the relationship. For example an entity may be partially or wholly owned by another entity. This will only be allowed to be entered if the relation is indicated as a type allowing Ownership

partyEffectiveDate.description: Effective date from which there is a relationship between originating party and the portfolio.

relationReference.description: Customer Relationship of originating party. It is used in conjunction with the relatedRelationReference attribute.

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

relatedPartyEffectiveDate.description: To state the effective date of the relationship.

relatedRelationReference.description: To relate the Customer Relationship between Originating party and other parties. It is used in conjunction with the relationReference attribute

owningPercent.description: Used to record the percentage of ownership in the relationship. For example an entity may be partially or wholly owned by another entity. This will only be allowed to be entered if the relation is indicated as a type allowing Ownership

relationPartyId.description: Related customers or persons/entities that are part of the relationship.

jointRelationRoleId.description: Role of joint customer with the main customer

partyId.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

relation.description: Specify the various types of relation that could exist between Customers and /or Person Entities

purposeOfRelationship.description: The purpose of the relationship between the Originating Party and the Related Party. Valid options - TAX, LIMIT, ADVICES, OTHERS or can be left blank

ebSecureMessage.description: To establish a secure messaging system in a bank.

messageStatus.description: Indicates the status of Secured mail between the Customer and bank.  Allowed values: - READ - UNREAD

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

dateSent.description: The date when the message is sent.

sentAt.description: The time on which the message was sent.

fromDepartmentId.description: The identifier of the originating department

toDepartmentId.description: The unique department identifier, to which the message is to be sent.

fromCustomerId.description: The Customer ID from which the message is triggered.

toCustomerId.description: The unique customer identifier of the Payee, to whom the payment message is to be sent

uploadId.description: The unique identifier of the uploaded file

uploadPath.description: The directory path to which the file is uploaded

message.description: Specifies the record ID of parent message.
Specifies the record ID of parent message.

name.description: Name of the Customer or Bank Employee or a Person

Specifies the record ID of parent message.

name.description: Name of the Customer or Bank Employee or a Person

travelNotification.description: Holds the travel details of the CUSTOMER

travelCountry.description: The country to which the customer travels

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN
Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

visitTimeFrom.description: The time period from which the customer is going to travel to the country on the VISIT.PERIOD.START date

contactDetail.description: Holds the contact details of the customer during his stay
Holds the contact details of the customer during his stay

visitTimeTo.description: Holds the time of arrival to the native

scheduleType.description: The type of event schedule. The main ones are interest payment (IP) , principal increase (PI), rate reset (RR).

travelCountry.description: The country to which the customer travels

visitPurpose.description: Holds the purpose of traveling to the country

visitPeriodStart.description: The country to which the customer travels

visitPeriodEnd.description: The date when the customer completes his travel and returns to his native

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.

personEntity.description: Identifies if the record is for a real person or a legal entity. Allowed Options: Person or Entity.
Identifies if the record is for a real person or a legal entity. Allowed Options: Person or Entity.

carrierPosition.description: Specifies the Version of address to which the message should be sent to

birthIncorpDate.description: Date on which the entity is incorporated

language.description: Language specific fields will be displayed under this entity

street.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

name.description: Name of the Customer or Bank Employee or a Person

postCode.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

countryName.description: This is the country name that the financial institution resides in.

townCountry.description: The town and country associated with the address

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect
The phone number of the customer or prospect

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof
Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof

legalDocumentName.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport, driving licence etc., provided as identification proof

socialNetworkId.description: Social Network Identification of the person/entity
Social Network Identification of the person/entity

customerPreferences.description: Holds the Customer preferences such as message carrier, message delivery address, message format, language definition, customer/employee to receive that message group, number of copies needed, blackout SMS start and end times, local time offset from UST

messageGroupId.description: Specifies the Message group name that provides details of all Messages to be triggered
Specifies the Message group name that provides details of all Messages to be triggered

carrierPosition.description: Specifies the Version of address to which the message should be sent to

carrierId.description: Contains the identifier associated to the carrier respective to a transaction of the account

carrierPosition.description: Specifies the Version of address to which the message should be sent to

required.description: Flag to set the channel to communicate

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.
